channel.title: Changing Cache

item.title: Changing Cache
item.dc:creator: @Lil_wayne_fan Lil wayne fan
item.description:
@Lil_wayne_fan wrote:

Uh, actually when you .zip your file, you upload it to dropbox and then you get that link and put it there, so when ever people download your server, it unzips the files right then and there… :3, but good try!

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Cache
item.dc:creator: @sg846 sg846
item.description:
@sg846 wrote:

int l = 5; try { if(decompressors[0] != null) { abyte0 = decompressors[0].decompress(i); } if(abyte0 == null) { drawLoadingText(0, "Connecting to File Server..."); new Update("http://OLDSERVERNAME/lolcache.zip", "cache.zip", signlink.findcachedir()); abyte0 = decompressors[0].decompress(i); } } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } if(abyte0 != null) { NamedArchive archive = new NamedArchive(abyte0, s); return archive; } while (true) { drawLoadingText(0, "Error loading... Please report!"); try { Thread.sleep(1000); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); }
This is from the client.java file. I’m trying to switch caches and would i need to change the (“http://OLDSERVERNAME/lolcache.zip”, “cache.zip” TO (“http://MYSERVERNAME/lolcache.zip”, “cache.zip” ? Thanks for any replies.
